attributes.title: Absolute trash
attributes.review: Racist, app breaks phone AND brain cells, gave my grandma cancer and I’ll never give my time to this ever again. Called my war veteran grandpa a slur and kicked him down the stairs. Awful awful app. Never again. Offended to see this on the App Store.

attributes.title: THIS IS RIDICULOUS!!! 😡😡
attributes.review: I can’t believe I used this app to support my president Donald J. Trump but sadly this app keeps crashing!! As a fellow American 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸who believes “aLl LiVeS mAtTeR!!” But this app refuses for me to show all amazing news about Trump. Get rid of this app!!
